Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterUserImplI

All Superinterfaces:
HeaterUserAndControlI, HeaterUserAndExternalControlI
All Known Subinterfaces:
HeaterUserCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
Heater, Heater, HeaterUserConnector, HeaterUserInboundPort, HeaterUserOutboundPort
public interface HeaterUserImplI extends HeaterUserAndControlI, HeaterUserAndExternalControlI
The interface HeaterUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the heater: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-09-18

Author:
Jacques Malenfant
